title: Large wholesale stores, auto dealer showrooms, warehouses / storages, auto service centres, Garages etc
clause_text: Large wholesale stores, auto dealer showrooms, warehouses / storages, auto service centres, Garages etc. shall not be permissible in NMRC. Provision of Inclusive housing shall not be applicable in NMRC.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Large wholesale stores, auto dealer showrooms, warehouses / storages, auto service centres, Garages etc. shall not be permissible in NMRC.
